name: Peacock Feather Blue Green Button Bracelet
description:
Lovely button charm bracelet packed full of vintage and new buttons in beautiful shades of emerald green and aqua blue, like a peacock feather. The silver plated bracelet is approx 7.5 inches long and is secured with a toggle and hoop clasp.
Bracelets are made to order and may vary ever so slightly from the one photographed but will have the same number of buttons in the same shades.
I can adjust the bracelets to be made either bigger or smaller if needed, there is no extra charge for this.

name: Creamy White Pearly King & Queen Button Bracelet
description:
Lovely silver plated charm bracelet loaded with pale, creamy and white pearly buttons. The buttons are a mixture of new and vintage. The charm bracelet is secured with a toggle and hoop clasp and is approx 7.5 inches long. All findings are silver plated. This neutral coloured bracelet will look fabulous with any outfit, dressy or casual.
Bracelets are made to order and may vary ever so slightly from the one photographed but will have the same number of buttons of the same shades.
